Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、さっきの<Blue>漆黒の翼<White>って、 <Eugene>は知ってたの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey <Eugene>, do you know who the <Blue>Dark Wings<White> are?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……名前さえ聞いた事はなかったな。 おそらく最近、<Blue>王の盾<White>に入った連中だろう。
Entry.EnglishText: No... I've never heard of them. They're likely new recruits of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクたちの相手をするには、 修行が足りないね、って感じだったよネ♪
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think they've had enough training to be able to take us on♪

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、油断大敵だ。 どんな相手でも、気を抜くんじゃないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Overconfidence is one's greatest enemy. Never let your guard down, no matter who it is.
